header.customize: Need to customize your own design?

homeHero.title: Style Meets Comfort Furniture Made for You
homeHero.desc: From cozy sofas to elegant dining sets, discover furniture that turns your house into a home. Let me know if you'd like a different tone or style!

features.title: More Than Just a Furniture Store – Your Source for Architectural Blocks
features.subtitle: Explore a unique blend of quality furniture and essential architectural resources, all in one place.
features.premiumDesc: Discover beautifully crafted furniture for every space.
features.blocksDesc: Access downloadable architectural blocks for your design projects.
features.allInOneDesc: Elevate your projects with furniture and design tools in one place.

mainCategories.title: Browse As
mainCategories.subtitle: From elegant interiors to inspiring exteriors and artistic scenes — browse our categories and find the perfect touch for every corner of your home.

choice.title: The Best Furniture Manufacturer of your choice
choice.description: At ArchiLink, we craft high-quality, stylish, and durable furniture designed to elevate any space. With expert craftsmanship and premium materials, we bring comfort, elegance, and functionality to your home or business. Choose excellence. Choose ArchiLink.

specificProducts.title: Top Sellers
specificProducts.subtitle: Our top sellers are carefully selected from the world’s best products, offering you number-one quality and trusted excellence.

newProducts.title: Shop by Category
newProducts.subtitle: Get the perfect piece for every space—living, dining, bedroom & more—all now with special promo prices!

customOrder.title: We help you make Modern Interior Design
customOrder.subtitle: Bringing your vision to life with stylish, functional pieces for the perfect modern space.

box1.title: Inspire Your Space
box1.desc: We bring contemporary design ideas to life, transforming any room into a stylish, functional space.

box2.title: Tailored to You
box2.desc: Your vision is our guide. We help you curate a personalized design that perfectly reflects your style and needs.

recentBlogs.title: Recent Blog
recentBlogs.subtitle: Explore fresh insights from the world of interior and exterior design. Our recent blogs bring you expert advice, décor trends, and scene styling inspiration — all in one place.

reviews.title: What people are saying about us

reviewForm.title: Your Feedback Matters: Share Your Review
